4437 (mi->interp_filter == cm->interp_filter &&
4438 cm->interp_filter != SWITCHABLE)) {
4439 tmp_best_rdu = tmp_rd;
4440 tmp_best_rate = rate;
4441 tmp_best_ratey = rate_y;
4442 tmp_best_distortion = distortion;
4443 tmp_best_sse = total_sse;
4444 tmp_best_skippable = skippable;
4445 tmp_best_mbmode = *mi;
4446 x->sum_y_eobs[TX_4X4] = 0;
4447 for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
4448 tmp_best_bmodes[i] = xd->mi[0]->bmi[i];
4449 x->zcoeff_blk[TX_4X4][i] = !x->plane[0].eobs[i];
4450 x->sum_y_eobs[TX_4X4] += x->plane[0].eobs[i];
4451 }
4452 pred_exists = 1;
4453 if (switchable_filter_index == 0 && sf->use_rd_breakout &&
4454 best_rd < INT64_MAX) {
4455 if (tmp_best_rdu / 2 > best_rd) {
4456 // skip searching the other filters if the first is
4457 // already substantially larger than the best so far
4458 tmp_best_filter = mi->interp_filter;
4459 tmp_best_rdu = INT64_MAX;
4460 break;
4461 }
4462 }
4463 }
4464 } // switchable_filter_index loop
4465 }
4466 }
4467
4468 if (tmp_best_rdu == INT64_MAX && pred_exists) continue;
4469
4470 mi->interp_filter = (cm->interp_filter == SWITCHABLE ? tmp_best_filter
4471 : cm->interp_filter);
4472 if (!pred_exists) {
4473 // Handles the special case when a filter that is not in the
4474 // switchable list (bilinear, 6-tap) is indicated at the frame level
4475 tmp_rd = rd_pick_best_sub8x8_mode(
4476 cpi, x, &x->mbmi_ext->ref_mvs[ref_frame][0], second_ref, best_yrd,
4477 &rate, &rate_y, &distortion, &skippable, &total_sse,
4478 (int)this_rd_thresh, seg_mvs, bsi, 0, mi_row, mi_col);
4479 if (tmp_rd == INT64_MAX) continue;
4480 x->sum_y_eobs[TX_4X4] = 0;
4481 for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
4482 x->zcoeff_blk[TX_4X4][i] = !x->plane[0].eobs[i];
4483 x->sum_y_eobs[TX_4X4] += x->plane[0].eobs[i];
4484 }
4485 } else {
4486 total_sse = tmp_best_sse;
4487 rate = tmp_best_rate;
4488 rate_y = tmp_best_ratey;
4489 distortion = tmp_best_distortion;
4490 skippable = tmp_best_skippable;
4491 *mi = tmp_best_mbmode;
4492 for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) xd->mi[0]->bmi[i] = tmp_best_bmodes[i];
4493 }
4494
4495 rate2 += rate;
4496 distortion2 += distortion;
4497
4498 if (cm->interp_filter == SWITCHABLE)
4499 rate2 += vp9_get_switchable_rate(cpi, xd);
4500
4501 if (!mode_excluded)
4502 mode_excluded = comp_pred ? cm->reference_mode == SINGLE_REFERENCE
4503 : cm->reference_mode == COMPOUND_REFERENCE;
4504
4505 compmode_cost = vp9_cost_bit(comp_mode_p, comp_pred);
4506
4507 tmp_best_rdu =
4508 best_rd - VPXMIN(RDCOST(x->rdmult, x->rddiv, rate2, distortion2),
4509 RDCOST(x->rdmult, x->rddiv, 0, total_sse));
4510
4511 if (tmp_best_rdu > 0) {
4512 // If even the 'Y' rd value of split is higher than best so far
4513 // then dont bother looking at UV
4514 vp9_build_inter_predictors_sbuv(&x->e_mbd, mi_row, mi_col, BLOCK_8X8);
4515 memset(x->skip_txfm, SKIP_TXFM_NONE, sizeof(x->skip_txfm));
4516 if (!super_block_uvrd(cpi, x, &rate_uv, &distortion_uv, &uv_skippable,
4517 &uv_sse, BLOCK_8X8, tmp_best_rdu)) {
4518 for (ref = 0; ref < 2; ++ref) {
4519 if (scaled_ref_frame[ref]) {
4520 int i;
4521 for (i = 0; i < MAX_MB_PLANE; ++i)
4522 xd->plane[i].pre[ref] = backup_yv12[ref][i];
4523 }
4524 }
4525 continue;
4526 }
4527
4528 rate2 += rate_uv;
4529 distortion2 += distortion_uv;
4530 skippable = skippable && uv_skippable;
4531 total_sse += uv_sse;
4532 }
4533
4534 for (ref = 0; ref < 2; ++ref) {
4535 if (scaled_ref_frame[ref]) {
4536 // Restore the prediction frame pointers to their unscaled versions.
4537 int i;
4538 for (i = 0; i < MAX_MB_PLANE; ++i)
4539 xd->plane[i].pre[ref] = backup_yv12[ref][i];
4540 }
4541 }
4542 }
4543
4544 if (cm->reference_mode == REFERENCE_MODE_SELECT) rate2 += compmode_cost;
4545
4546 // Estimate the reference frame signaling cost and add it
4547 // to the rolling cost variable.
4548 if (second_ref_frame > INTRA_FRAME) {
4549 rate2 += ref_costs_comp[ref_frame];
4550 } else {
4551 rate2 += ref_costs_single[ref_frame];
4552 }
4553
4554 if (!disable_skip) {
4555 const vpx_prob skip_prob = vp9_get_skip_prob(cm, xd);
4556 const int skip_cost0 = vp9_cost_bit(skip_prob, 0);
4557 const int skip_cost1 = vp9_cost_bit(skip_prob, 1);
4558
4559 // Skip is never coded at the segment level for sub8x8 blocks and instead
4560 // always coded in the bitstream at the mode info level.
4561 if (ref_frame != INTRA_FRAME && !xd->lossless) {
4562 if (RDCOST(x->rdmult, x->rddiv, rate_y + rate_uv + skip_cost0,
4563 distortion2) <
4564 RDCOST(x->rdmult, x->rddiv, skip_cost1, total_sse)) {
4565 // Add in the cost of the no skip flag.
4566 rate2 += skip_cost0;
4567 } else {
4568 // FIXME(rbultje) make this work for splitmv also
4569 rate2 += skip_cost1;
4570 distortion2 = total_sse;
4571 assert(total_sse >= 0);
4572 rate2 -= (rate_y + rate_uv);
4573 rate_y = 0;
4574 rate_uv = 0;
4575 this_skip2 = 1;
4576 }
4577 } else {
4578 // Add in the cost of the no skip flag.
4579 rate2 += skip_cost0;
4580 }
4581
4582 // Calculate the final RD estimate for this mode.
4583 this_rd = RDCOST(x->rdmult, x->rddiv, rate2, distortion2);
4584 }
4585
4586 if (!disable_skip && ref_frame == INTRA_FRAME) {
4587 for (i = 0; i < REFERENCE_MODES; ++i)
4588 best_pred_rd[i] = VPXMIN(best_pred_rd[i], this_rd);
4589 for (i = 0; i < SWITCHABLE_FILTER_CONTEXTS; i++)
4590 best_filter_rd[i] = VPXMIN(best_filter_rd[i], this_rd);
4591 }
4592
4593 // Did this mode help.. i.e. is it the new best mode
4594 if (this_rd < best_rd || x->skip) {
4595 if (!mode_excluded) {
4596 int max_plane = MAX_MB_PLANE;
4597 // Note index of best mode so far
4598 best_ref_index = ref_index;
4599
4600 if (ref_frame == INTRA_FRAME) {
4601 /* required for left and above block mv */
4602 mi->mv[0].as_int = 0;
4603 max_plane = 1;
4604 // Initialize interp_filter here so we do not have to check for
4605 // inter block modes in get_pred_context_switchable_interp()
4606 mi->interp_filter = SWITCHABLE_FILTERS;
4607 }
4608
4609 rd_cost->rate = rate2;
4610 rd_cost->dist = distortion2;
4611 rd_cost->rdcost = this_rd;
4612 best_rd = this_rd;
4613 best_yrd =
4614 best_rd - RDCOST(x->rdmult, x->rddiv, rate_uv, distortion_uv);
4615 best_mbmode = *mi;
4616 best_skip2 = this_skip2;
4617 if (!x->select_tx_size) swap_block_ptr(x, ctx, 1, 0, 0, max_plane);
4618 memcpy(ctx->zcoeff_blk, x->zcoeff_blk[TX_4X4],
4619 sizeof(ctx->zcoeff_blk[0]) * ctx->num_4x4_blk);
4620 ctx->sum_y_eobs = x->sum_y_eobs[TX_4X4];
4621
4622 for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) best_bmodes[i] = xd->mi[0]->bmi[i];
4623
4624 // TODO(debargha): enhance this test with a better distortion prediction
4625 // based on qp, activity mask and history
4626 if ((sf->mode_search_skip_flags & FLAG_EARLY_TERMINATE) &&
4627 (ref_index > MIN_EARLY_TERM_INDEX)) {
4628 int qstep = xd->plane[0].dequant[1];
4629 // TODO(debargha): Enhance this by specializing for each mode_index
4630 int scale = 4;
4631#if CONFIG_VP9_HIGHBITDEPTH
4632 if (xd->cur_buf->flags & YV12_FLAG_HIGHBITDEPTH) {
4633 qstep >>= (xd->bd - 8);
4634 }
4635#endif // CONFIG_VP9_HIGHBITDEPTH
4636 if (x->source_variance < UINT_MAX) {
4637 const int var_adjust = (x->source_variance < 16);
4638 scale -= var_adjust;
4639 }
4640 if (ref_frame > INTRA_FRAME && distortion2 * scale < qstep * qstep) {
4641 early_term = 1;
4642 }
4643 }
4644 }
4645 }
4646
4647 /* keep record of best compound/single-only prediction */
4648 if (!disable_skip && ref_frame != INTRA_FRAME) {
4649 int64_t single_rd, hybrid_rd, single_rate, hybrid_rate;
4650
4651 if (cm->reference_mode == REFERENCE_MODE_SELECT) {
4652 single_rate = rate2 - compmode_cost;
4653 hybrid_rate = rate2;
4654 } else {
4655 single_rate = rate2;
4656 hybrid_rate = rate2 + compmode_cost;
4657 }
4658
4659 single_rd = RDCOST(x->rdmult, x->rddiv, single_rate, distortion2);
4660 hybrid_rd = RDCOST(x->rdmult, x->rddiv, hybrid_rate, distortion2);
4661
4662 if (!comp_pred && single_rd < best_pred_rd[SINGLE_REFERENCE])
4663 best_pred_rd[SINGLE_REFERENCE] = single_rd;
4664 else if (comp_pred && single_rd < best_pred_rd[COMPOUND_REFERENCE])
4665 best_pred_rd[COMPOUND_REFERENCE] = single_rd;
4666
4667 if (hybrid_rd < best_pred_rd[REFERENCE_MODE_SELECT])
4668 best_pred_rd[REFERENCE_MODE_SELECT] = hybrid_rd;
4669 }
4670
4671 /* keep record of best filter type */
4672 if (!mode_excluded && !disable_skip && ref_frame != INTRA_FRAME &&
4673 cm->interp_filter != BILINEAR) {
4674 int64_t ref =
4675 filter_cache[cm->interp_filter == SWITCHABLE ? SWITCHABLE_FILTERS
4676 : cm->interp_filter];
4677 int64_t adj_rd;
4678 for (i = 0; i < SWITCHABLE_FILTER_CONTEXTS; i++) {
4679 if (ref == INT64_MAX)
4680 adj_rd = 0;
4681 else if (filter_cache[i] == INT64_MAX)
4682 // when early termination is triggered, the encoder does not have
4683 // access to the rate-distortion cost. it only knows that the cost
4684 // should be above the maximum valid value. hence it takes the known
4685 // maximum plus an arbitrary constant as the rate-distortion cost.
4686 adj_rd = mask_filter - ref + 10;
4687 else
4688 adj_rd = filter_cache[i] - ref;
4689
4690 adj_rd += this_rd;
4691 best_filter_rd[i] = VPXMIN(best_filter_rd[i], adj_rd);
4692 }
4693 }
4694
4695 if (early_term) break;
4696
4697 if (x->skip && !comp_pred) break;
4698 }
4699
4700 if (best_rd >= best_rd_so_far) {
4701 rd_cost->rate = INT_MAX;
4702 rd_cost->rdcost = INT64_MAX;
4703 return;
4704 }
4705
4706 // If we used an estimate for the uv intra rd in the loop above...
4707 if (sf->use_uv_intra_rd_estimate) {
4708 // Do Intra UV best rd mode selection if best mode choice above was intra.
4709 if (best_mbmode.ref_frame[0] == INTRA_FRAME) {
4710 *mi = best_mbmode;
4711 rd_pick_intra_sbuv_mode(cpi, x, ctx, &rate_uv_intra, &rate_uv_tokenonly,
4712 &dist_uv, &skip_uv, BLOCK_8X8, TX_4X4);
4713 }
4714 }
4715
4716 if (best_rd == INT64_MAX) {
4717 rd_cost->rate = INT_MAX;
4718 rd_cost->dist = INT64_MAX;
4719 rd_cost->rdcost = INT64_MAX;
4720 return;
4721 }
4722
4723 assert((cm->interp_filter == SWITCHABLE) ||
4724 (cm->interp_filter == best_mbmode.interp_filter) ||
4725 !is_inter_block(&best_mbmode));
4726
4727 vp9_update_rd_thresh_fact(tile_data->thresh_freq_fact, sf->adaptive_rd_thresh,
4728 bsize, best_ref_index);
4729
4730 // macroblock modes
4731 *mi = best_mbmode;
4732 x->skip |= best_skip2;
4733 if (!is_inter_block(&best_mbmode)) {
4734 for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) xd->mi[0]->bmi[i].as_mode = best_bmodes[i].as_mode;
4735 } else {
4736 for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i)
4737 memcpy(&xd->mi[0]->bmi[i], &best_bmodes[i], sizeof(b_mode_info));
4738
4739 mi->mv[0].as_int = xd->mi[0]->bmi[3].as_mv[0].as_int;
4740 mi->mv[1].as_int = xd->mi[0]->bmi[3].as_mv[1].as_int;
4741 }
4742 // If the second reference does not exist, set the corresponding mv to zero.
4743 if (mi->ref_frame[1] == NONE) {
4744 mi->mv[1].as_int = 0;
4745 for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
4746 mi->bmi[i].as_mv[1].as_int = 0;
4747 }
4748 }
4749
4750 for (i = 0; i < REFERENCE_MODES; ++i) {
4751 if (best_pred_rd[i] == INT64_MAX)
4752 best_pred_diff[i] = INT_MIN;
4753 else
4754 best_pred_diff[i] = best_rd - best_pred_rd[i];
4755 }
4756
4757 if (!x->skip) {
4758 for (i = 0; i < SWITCHABLE_FILTER_CONTEXTS; i++) {
4759 if (best_filter_rd[i] == INT64_MAX)
4760 best_filter_diff[i] = 0;
4761 else
4762 best_filter_diff[i] = best_rd - best_filter_rd[i];
4763 }
4764 if (cm->interp_filter == SWITCHABLE)
4765 assert(best_filter_diff[SWITCHABLE_FILTERS] == 0);
4766 } else {
4767 vp9_zero(best_filter_diff);
4768 }
4769
4770 store_coding_context(x, ctx, best_ref_index, best_pred_diff, best_filter_diff,
4771 0);
4772}
4773#endif // !CONFIG_REALTIME_ONLY
4774
